mapper.select: select p.problemNo, p.multipleChoice, p.title, u.nickname, p.contents, p.categoryNo, p.type from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where p.problemNo = #{problemNo}
select h.hashTagNo, h.hashTag from hashtag h join hashtagmapping m on h.hashTagNo = m.hashTagNo where m.problemNo = #{problemNo}
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from hashtagmapping m join problem p join usernickname u on m.problemNo = p.problemNo and p.uid = u.uid where m.hashTagNo = #{hashTagNo}
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where p.categoryNo = #{categoryNo}
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where p.categoryNo like concat(#{categoryLargeMediumNo}, '%')
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where p.categoryNo like concat(#{categoryLargeNo}, '%')
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where p.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where p.problemNo = #{problemNo}
select p.problemNo, p.title, u.nickname from problem p join usernickname u on p.uid = u.uid where u.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: insert into problem (multipleChoice, title, uid, contents, categoryNo, type, flag) values(#{multipleChoice}, #{title}, #{uid},#{contents},#{categoryNo},#{type},0)
